content.Age: Short Number of ticks the XP orb has been 'untouched'. After 6000 ticks (5 minutes) the XP orb is destroyed.
content.Health: Byte The health of the XP orb. XP orbs take damage from fire, lava, falling anvils and explosions. The XP orb is destroyed when its health reaches 0.
content.Value: Short Amount of XP this XP orb will give when picked up.
